topic: Which dissolvable conductors, dielectrics, and encapsulants enable time-programmed water/soil sensors that operate stably for weeks then resorb without e-waste—what degradation kinetics and wireless/data-retention strategies are most practical?

perspectives.perspective: Bio‑inspired Dissolvable Materials for Stable Weeks‑Long Operation
Kinetic Modeling of Multi‑Layer Transient Sensor Degradation
Low‑Power Wireless/Data‑Retention Strategies for Self‑Destructing Sensors
